++ Organize From The Beginning

OFTB means that TheSystem will be organized from the beginning to help FutureProofing. This is possible due to:
    * ComprehensiveSystem
    * DistinguishedContent
    * HighExtensibility
    * TriggerAnything
    * see http://www.ranum.com/security/computer_security/editorials/dumb/

TheSystem deals with OFTB by having many NoBaseTaskDownload, NativeImplementation]s and DesignedIn [Capability]s. Examples include:
    * Builtin [Security] software, PROCESSGUARD
